oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Veterinary Diagnostic Laboratory: Effective Use of Available Services
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Newman, Louis E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diagnostic laboratory
Appropriate Samples
Quality Samples
Signalment
sample regimens
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: How can you help the diagnostic laboratory help you? Three primary themes are emphasized throughout this discussion: (1) Appropriate Samples, (2) Quality Samples and (3) Signalment and History. These three themes are applicable in all sample regimens and discussions that follow.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 15-19
